divs: Sighting Detailsit was like a star-like object going straight , i went to my room to get my ipad to film it and i couldnt find it again it disaappearedand when i saw it moving it was about 30 miles per hour.. 1- i was at my room looking at the stars in the sky 2- i suddenly saw a star like object moving 3-a star 4-it looked like a star , it was moving around 30 miles per hour in a straight line 5-6- holy s**t no way could that be a ufo , i was excited i saw it for about 10 seconds then went into the room to get my ipad to film it and then i lost it
